# Welcome

These notes collect concise explanations and examples on statistics and machine learning topics I often revisit in research and teaching.  
Each section in the sidebar corresponds to a different topic area — click to open any note.

## How to read

- **Basic Statistics** – probability, distributions, hypothesis tests  
- **Bayesian Statistics** – posterior inference, MCMC, applied examples  
- **Machine Learning** – regression, trees, ensemble methods

## Tags & Features

- All examples reproducible in **R or Python**
- Lightweight Quarto pages (HTML only)
- Auto-generated sidebar and search
